评论详情: I love this jacket!! The material is sturdy and it keeps the wind out 100 percent. It looks great!! I bought a XXL and it fits perfectly with a little bit of wiggle room! Overall this jacket is definitely worth the money and it’ll keep you warm in the winter! It also has a detachable hood which is really great since my warehouse job dose not allow hoods in the building.

Obviously we like the look or we wouldn't order it. It's 25°f out and I have been warm walking in the cold with only a t-shirt under. The hood is a good size to stop wind if it isn't facing you. The material is nice and durable it seems. All in all a pretty good coat for winter, and I have their windbreaker with the compass on the sleeve for indoors or mild outdoor temperatures. Cool company with cool clothing!

I have only worn it a few times since purchasing but this coat is nice. It's very warm and a little heavy in the materials department. It is very well made using high quality materials. You won't be disappointed with this coat.

This is a very oversized and baggy-fitting heavy duty coat with a tactical streetwear vibe. Nice quality, thick sturdy material, heavy quilted lining. Warm without being bulky. Lots of stylish details. It’s more of a winter coat, rather than a casual jacket for layering.  I ordered it in size S for my petite 5’-3” 100 lb daughter because XS was not available. The size S was HUGE on her! However, she loved that it was super baggy because that’s the look she was going for.

评论概述: great quality size was huge compared to what i normally wear.
评论详情: great quality size was huge compared to what i normally wear. would recomend getting a size smaller

This big black winter parka looked very impressive once I got it out of the product bag. It’s very trendy, it’s very thick and it’s very warm – at least inside the house. The removable hood will cover your head completely and there is an ingenious cutout on the back of the coat that makes it perfect for riding a scooter. The seams and zippers were meant for tough use.  But all is not well with this techwear parka. The seller says it’s made of cotton or cotton blend material and it is not: it is 100% polyester. The outer shell of the parka is not even water-resistant, so wearing this in the rain and snow will only make you wet and cold. So, if you get this jacket, be sure to order a big can of waterproofing spray with it or you’ll be sorry. Another big flaw with this thing is that it has no inside pockets, which for a cold weather coat is pretty ridiculous. Better not keep any electronics in those large non-waterproof front pockets!  And this parka is not cheap. At this price point it should at least keep you warm AND dry when you’re outside in winter weather. Trendy, schmendy. If you want to stay comfortable in the snow and wet this winter, you’ll have to look elsewhere. It’s your money, spend it wisely.
Really good quality, looks great, and just as excepted heavy materials. And I like the buckle on the top area of the jacket, it has modern look but still easy to use.
Great quality and perfect for winter weather!
Great jacket for my skii trip!

The NIepce street wear jacket is a very good and high quality product that I was really surprised to see from the company. Prior to getting this jacket I was not familiar with the brand and products, but I am so happy that I gave it a try, the design and execution are close to perfect. As soon as you take it out of the package, you will immediately notice the quality and craftsmanship applied here, the zippers are very good and high quality, granted they are not Ideal or YKK made, but they are good and they are including pull strings on every zipper end for better grip and convenience. The size I ordered was L and for my body type, I am 5.10'' and about 185Lbs, the jacket is slightly on the larger size, but that is kind of the point with the modern fit, it needs to be a bit loose to a line with the modern day fashion. This jacket can be worn during the colder winter months, just keep in mind that it is not super insulated so extreme cold temperatures would be an issue, but for normal above freezing temperatures, it will be perfectly fine. The design is the biggest selling point here, the jacket is unique with a lot of added elements that you don't see every day, all the side, back and front straps, the added patches, and that unusual cut on the lower back side are something special and ties the design nicely, that is my favorite part, it is just looking unique, well and obviously very comfortable too. The jacket features a removable hood as well, which I personally prefer and in addition to the two outside, zip up pockets, there are two large front pockets as well. When it comes to insulation, Niepce are using premium heavy duty polyester material on the outer shell of the jacket infused with cotton blend material inside the jacket for warmth, creating both breathable and thermal. I think the only major negative, for most people, would be the price of the jacket, I think at the asking retail price of $70-80 you will probably be better waiting for deep holiday discounts, and the second minor negative is not using any top level zipper brands like YKK and Ideal, but regardless I think for the style and fashion the asking price is not all that bad. Overall, a great jacket by Niepce, with a lot of modern day features, it is comfortable, stylish and will keep you warm.
Sleek techwear design with good insulation. Some might find the fit a bit tight; sizing up recommended.
I really like this jacket, I got it a bit bigger then needed because I wear thick sweaters under for winter. It's comfortable, fits as I wanted and looks so cool. Really want the helmet too xD

This is a very interesting parka. It is very heavy and very warm, and feels almost like a military/police type of parka, except for the eccentric Japanese-style detailing. Notably the big square cut out in the butt, but also some kanji and other nice details, and lots of toggles and other hardware. It fits super great and in line with projected sizing. The only real complaint I would have is that the zipper is a double zipper with two pulls instead of a base, and I got it misaligned and nearly broke it on the very first pull, so not sure how strong it is compared to the rest of the garment. It's a very heavy zipper but still. Great jacket tho!

评论概述: Surprisingly practical and comfortable--- size runs big, recommend going down one.
评论详情: This is an intentionally oversized and baggy fitting garment, so you can probably get away with ordering a size down from your usual. (The "medium" fits me like a US Large, so I definitely could have gone with a small-- but this gives plenty of room to layer over an outfit, or just lean into the baggy streetwear style.)  The quality is high, and the value seems to be there--- the price-point (around $99 at time of review) seems reasonable for what you get.  The patches are removable (velcro) and there's plenty of pocket space (cargo and utility), and the hood is spacious and comfortable. Very satisfied.

评论概述: Quality Construction, Heavy Quilted Lining, Removable Hood
评论详情: This jacket is styled in a way that appeals to anime design enthusiasts. We got this for our daughter - no review from her yet, so we'll update if she has feedback. I like the quality of the stitching, the heavy quilted lining, the long sleeves and the hood. The hood is removable, and there's a functional neck strap to hold the collar up when you're sans hood. The other straps are mostly for the aesthetic appeal, but they don't seem like they'd get in the way of real world usage. The kanji patch on the front is velcro attached, so you can swith it out with other velcro backed patches for variety. Overall, this seems to be a high quality jacket that should be stylish enough for the the kiddo, and warm enough to satisfy the parentals.

I got this jacket for my brother because he likes the stylish and different style clothing. The jacket is a good size and thickness. It will definitely keep you warm and has a lot of pocket spaces.  It is well designed and very well made.

I really like this jacket. It looks really cool, feels like good quality, and its pretty comfortable. There are a lot of pockets and features in the jacket as well as a removable hood and two zippers. The only thing I have to say is that it is pretty large.

I love this jacket. Its design is very beautiful and futuristic. The material is of very high quality, it is very resistant that it does not break easily if it gets stuck by accident. It is very soft and comfortable that it does not bother you at all. It's warm so you won't be cold and the brocades are well cared for, unlike others that have hanging threads. Right now in this cold season I can use it every day and its design matches all my clothes. Thank you.
This jacket looks awesome but it’s also a great jacket. It’s heavy duty and made for cold weather. It will definitely keep you warm and looking futuristic while it does it.

Jacket has a tech wear japanese street style. Has a couple Japanese logos/script on it tastefully located/placed on the coat. Has a nice amount of pockets in convenient spots and has a classic yet cool look. It is made of a quality material that looks perfect for winter and the materials look ideal for snow/cold weather. It's comfortable and has a nice amount of room. It's insulated well, warm and looks like it will last. Hood, zippers, pockets- all good quality. Good jacket for winter and I'd recommend it.

评论概述: Very Cool Winter Coat That Is Warm & Comfortable
评论详情: I ordered this jacket for my son who is in his 20’s and I thought that this type of style would be more to his liking. This winter coat/parka is considered to be a Japanese style coat. The outer fabric of this coat is made from heavy duty polyester and the inside of the jacket is made from a cotton blend fabric. These 2 fabrics are of high quality and they will ensure a very warm and comfortable, soft & breathable coat for winter. The look of the outside of the jacket is definitely Japanese Techno and the kanji design on the front of the jacket means “movement”. This jacket has drop down straps all the way around the jacket so it can take on a kind of techno/tactical vibe. This jacket has 2 large pockets on the front and it is a full front zipper closure. This is a well made, really cool version of Japanese techno culture and my son loves it. I ordered his size per the size guide that was provided and it seems it is supposed to be an oversized jacket and that is how it fit my son. I would highly recommend to others.

Great quality jacket! Be aware it’s super oversized. I was curious about the price tag and I can tell you would find a jacket like that triple more expensive at the stores. I’m pretty sure it’s gonna protect you from any weather. It has so many details! Super recommend!

This is a very well made coat. It's heavy enough that it should be classified as a coat and not a jacket. This will work well for my son in the upcoming colder months. He loves that the straps and buckles make it cool streetwear. The price is reasonable for the quality of this product.

I got this for my son and it fits him perfectly! He loves the style and how heavy it is - it is very warm, perfect for the colder months. It seems to be well made with some really neat elements and the sizing seems to be pretty true. Overall, it's just a cool winter parka!

This techwear parka is perfect for winter. It’s warm and well-insulated without being too bulky, and the style is on point. The material feels high-quality, and the pockets are spacious enough for carrying essentials. It fits true to size, and the adjustable hood is great for windy days. A perfect combination of fashion and function for cold weather!

This is an excellent gift for fans of Japanese manga or games, especially modern ones like Ghostwire Tokyo or recent ones. This jacket manages to have the exact feel of those looks, and really looks quite cool. Do note the mask is not included haha, it really draws the eye in pictures, but make sure you're looking at and judging by the jacket alone. It's pretty well made, quite thick and sturdy. It's extremely warm, you get overheated immediately in summer, so I feel like this will be quite warm in winter. It feels dense, I guess is the right word. The hood is attached with a zipper so you can take it off when not needed, and is a good stiffy build that sits on your head stylishly without flopping down like some hoods. The patch with kanji is attached with velcro so you can easily take it off and swap it with something else. The zipper in front can go both up or down. With a lot of extra straps, it's a more complicated, stylish jacket. As long as it fits your style, and you wear it in colder weather, this could become a favorite jacket easily. It's more than just fashion, quite likeable if you like the Japanese aesthetic. Just note it's quite warm, so you'll probably overheat indoors. But if you're outside in winter, that will be a good thing.
This thing fits as expected. If you want it to have the oversized look like pictured, you may want to order a size up.
I absolutely love this jacket, it's true to size and so comfortable. It's stylish and high quality it was a fantastic value and I highly recommend 5 stars

This jacket isn't messing around - it is thick, sturdy, well made and beautifully tailored, and looks like it cost twice as much as it did!!! It has a slick feel that should repel rain and snow well, while still retaining the cool matte look of techwear. Definitely a winter jacket and not an outer layer to casually throw on, but that is perfect because my partner is perpetually cold and will get a ton of use out of it this winter.

I love wearing this jacket. The buckles on the straps are a really nice touch. It's incredibly comfortable and fits me perfectly (6ft, 215lb). The jacket is also made of what feels to be a really durable material. Can't wait to run this through it's paces when it gets colder.

This black street parka is very stylish. Comes with pockets and straps. The patch says “Kody” Japanese for maneuvers. Fits well and is warm. Trendy looking and comfortable. Nice quality and fashionable jacket.

Yes, this is a 10 out of 10. I cannot believe the quality of this actual jacket I would be ready to go to the snow in it. It is super heavy and exceeded my expectations. I did order a size large and it is true to size. It is very comfortable. The style is amazing, the zippers actually work and there is real pockets . don’t hesitate on this jacket
This is actually  thick jacket. It looks great and fits well. It has multi directional zippers as well as a removable hoodie. Its definitely durable and comfortable.

评论概述: Not as Advertised... It is 100% Polyester.
评论详情: This Parka looks like well-constructed.  The hood could be removed via a zipper.  It is padded and looks like good for winter.However, the material on this parka jacket is not as stated.  The description on the fabric is Cotton Blend.  It also claims that it is “crafted from premium cotton...” The care instruction mentioned that this could be dry cleaned and it is OK to iron. None of the above matched the Clothing Label.  The label stated that this garment is 100% Polyester.  Do not dry clean and Do not iron are on the label also. It is rather confusing as it also states “IRONAT LOW TEMPERTURE”.I like cotton fabric and this is actually the very reason that I clicked the order button.  This Parka is actually quite nice it is just not as described.  I wanted to give this to my son who is in Beijing teaching. I plan to give him this Parka when he comes home for the New Year Holiday.  He rides a scooter short distance to and fro school. This quilted padded Parka jacket would be put to good use.Footnote: - This Parka would have been rated higher if the description and the information of the material are correct.  I dislike product that received, not matching what was advertised.

评论概述: There is a certain error in the actual object
评论详情: The actual product is quite thick and warm, but the shape is not as good as in the promotional pictures, and it has a lot of wool, which I need to trim.

This big black winter parka is like those seen in Japanese games, both stylish and functional. It's huge, thick, and warm. The removable hood is also huge and zips on or off with ease. This seems like a sturdy jacket and the 2-way zipper is a nice touch. There is a removable velcro patch and several pockets. On the down side, there are no inside pockets and the jacket does not seem waterproof so may not be very warm in wet weather.
